p: Currently, the food industry pays special attention to industrial transformation processes such as temperature, sudden changes in heat and pressure, and critical contamination levels of glucose fatty acids (GE), 3-MCPD, 2-MCPD and their esters to guarantee the quality of their products [ 1]. The same production companies are required to respect the environment by adhering to projects for the sustainability of palm oil, working together in national palm oil alliances.
